Class ExhibitView

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.awt.Component
      • java.awt.Container
        • java.awt.Window
          • java.awt.Frame
            • javax.swing.JFrame
              • view.classes.ExhibitView
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.awt.image.ImageObserver, java.awt.MenuContainer, java.io.Serializable, javax.accessibility.Accessible, javax.swing.RootPaneContainer, javax.swing.WindowConstants, IExhibitView

    public class ExhibitView
extends javax.swing.JFrame
implements IExhibitView
    The view where the user can see the list of exhibits and where allows him to add, modify and delete them and add the exhibit's artworks.
    Author:
    Elisa Casadio
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

                    double costTicket)
        Description copied from interface: IExhibitView
        Adds a new exhibit to be displayed.
        Specified by:
        addData in interface IExhibitView
        Parameters:
        code - the exhibit's code.
        title - the exhibit's title.
        curator - the exhibit's curator.
        dateB - the commencement date of the exhibit.
        dateE - the end date of the exhibit.
        nPieces - the number of pieces of the artworks.
        costEx - the exhibit's cost.
        costTicket - the ticket's cost of the exhibit.
